reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, particularly noting that the print looks better in person, and appreciate its fit that's loose without being baggy. The dress is comfortable with pockets, made of soft cotton fabric that doesn't cling, and comes in various colors including perfect summer black. Customers find it versatile, suitable for both casual and dressy occasions, and one customer mentions it's easy to care for. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfy
items.body: Beautiful dress! I received many compliments when I first wore it. The colors were perfect for either spring or summer. The second time I wore it, I used a pair of yellow canvas shoes I got here, and it looked so well! You can dress it up or down. The first time, I wore it with a cardigan and nice shoes, and it looked dressy. I wore it for work and for church which means it’s versatile. The best is that it’s not hot! It didn’t seem see through, but I wore it with shape-wear under it in my skin color. The fabric is light. It has pockets! I am 5’9” and wear size 16-18. I bought a XXL. It fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: ReadtoMe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly and is so comfortable!
items.body: This dress came right on time. When I opened the package I was surprised to feel the quality of the fabric and that there was no bad smell on the clothing! You can tell this dress was made with care. The seams are neat and sturdy and the fabric is thick enough to be sturdy and light enough to be cool in the heat! The dress is stretchy and easily accommodated my growing pregnant belly! The style is adorable, you can wear it casually and with a cute pair of cowgirl boots it makes a great outfit for church. The size is dead on and the dress has beautifully hidden POCKETS! This dress is a steal and I want it in every color. The value for the cost is amazing I highly recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Amara Walton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dresses--different colors might fit differently
items.body: This is a comfy and stylish dress! I ordered XXL because I'm tall and have bit of a spare tire. The top fits well and the skirt part flows and doesn't hug my curves. I bought black, olive, and the orange/rust color, and it seems that the olive doesn't fit as well. It's tighter in the top and the seam around the top is also uncomfortable (itchy/scratchy)--I think maybe because it's tighter. I plan on trying a couple other colors because they'll be perfect summer dresses otherwise. Read more
items.author: k_otter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!
items.body: I have tried many “empire waist” dresses with not such great results. This one, however, is super cute, super comfortable and fits just right. I am 5’3” and 118 lbs, ordered size M in black.The fabric is like a thick, stretchy T-shirt, very soft and easy to pull on (over the head), unlike some non-stretchy fabrics. On me, the length is also just right (mid-calf). The style is cute, but not “cutesy”, which is important to me, being perhaps older than many of you! Read more
items.author: aubaine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Cute dress. The color is nice and fit and style is nice. It is flattering. It can be dresses up or worn casual for everyday wear. Read more
items.author: recycle stuff

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved the fit, but fabric discoloration on both dresses
items.body: I really loved the style and fit of this dress—it was true to size and very flattering. Unfortunately, both times I ordered it, there were two perfectly square patches on each side of the chest area that had a brownish tinge to them. It looked like a defect in the fabric, and it was noticeable once I tried it on. I returned the first one and reordered, hoping it was just a one-off issue, but the second dress had the exact same problem. I would have kept it otherwise, because I really liked the dress. Read more
items.author: beachgirl721

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Confortable dress
items.body: Very pretty and comfortable dress. I have gotten a lot of compliments when I wear it. Looks like denim but is a softer, stretchy material. The fit is looser, but fits well. Read more
items.author: AMCow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy breezy
items.body: I love feeling put together when working from home. During breaks I sometimes run errands or walk my dogs. At 5 pm I want to be ready to run out the door. This dress is casual, inexpensive, cool in summer, looks great on Zoom and very comfy. The perfect house dress. I feel like I could easily wear in the fall with a sweater or scarf to change it up. I'm 5'8" and it hits just below the knee. I would not want it any shorter. One reviewer said she thought the top seam was too high. I found that wearing the right bra with the right lift made a huge difference. I got a denim blue color and am considering purchasing more in other patterns/shades. I seriously would like several for an easy to grab and get dressed WFH wardrobe. It's better than I expected, given the price. Read more
items.author: Dr Ed

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Yellow Navy Floral, Pink Floral, Deep Green, Orange Red Floral, Black Yellow Flower, Orange Floral, Peach, Orange Rust, Black, Grey Khaki Polka Dot, Rust Red White Dot, Lake Green, Blue Yellow Floral, Grey Pink Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
